tika-vin05t16:1_1: Duvidhaṁ sahaseyyakanti ‘‘yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena uttaridirattatirattaṁ sahaseyyaṁ kappeyya,
tika-vin05t16:1_3: Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena sahaseyyaṁ kappeyya,
tika-vin05t16:1_7: anupasampannena saddhiṁ tiṇṇaṁ rattīnaṁ upari catutthadivase atthaṅgate sūriye sabbacchannasabbaparicchanne
tika-vin05t16:1_8: yebhuyyacchannayebhuyyaparicchanne vā senāsane pubbāpariyena vā ekakkhaṇe vā nipajjantassa pācittiyaṁ.
tika-vin05t16:1_9: Tattha chadanaṁ anāhacca diyaḍḍhahatthubbedhena pākārādinā yena kenaci paricchannampi sabbaparicchannamicceva veditabbaṁ.
tika-vin05t16:1_10: Yaṁ senāsanaṁ upari pañcahi chadanehi aññena vā kenaci sabbameva paricchannaṁ,
tika-vin05t16:1_12: Aṭṭhakathāsu pana pākaṭavohāraṁ gahetvā vācuggatavasena ‘‘sabbacchannaṁ nāma pañcahi chadanehi channa’’nti vuttaṁ.
tika-vin05t16:1_14: atha kho dussakuṭiyaṁ sayantassapi na sakkā anāpatti kātuṁ,
tika-vin05t16:1_15: tasmā yaṁ kiñci paṭicchādanasamatthaṁ idha chadanañca paricchannañca veditabbaṁ.
tika-vin05t16:1_16: Pañcavidhacchadaneyeva hi gayhamāne padaracchannepi sahaseyyā na bhaveyya,
tika-vin05t16:1_17: tasmā yaṁ senāsanaṁ bhūmito paṭṭhāya yāvachadanaṁ āhacca pākārena vā aññena vā kenaci antamaso vatthenapi parikkhittaṁ,
tika-vin05t16:1_19: Chadanaṁ anāhacca sabbantimena pariyāyena diyaḍḍhahatthubbedhena pākārādinā parikkhittampi sabbaparicchannameva.
tika-vin05t16:1_20: Yassa pana upari bahutaraṁ ṭhānaṁ channaṁ,
tika-vin05t16:2_0: Iminā lakkhaṇena samannāgato sacepi sattabhūmiko pāsādo ekūpacāro hoti,
tika-vin05t16:2_3: Evarūpe senāsane anupasampannena saddhiṁ catutthadivase atthaṅgate sūriye nipajjantassa pācittiyaṁ vuttaṁ.
tika-vin05t16:2_9: bhikkhussa uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya nipajjane pana bhikkhusseva payogena bhikkhussa āpatti.
tika-vin05t16:3_2: Yo hi ekasmiṁ āvāse ekeneva anupasampannena saddhiṁ tirattaṁ sahaseyyaṁ kappeti,
tika-vin05t16:3_4: Yopi ekasmiṁyeva āvāse nānāanupasampannehi saddhiṁ tirattaṁ sahaseyyaṁ kappeti, tassapi.
tika-vin05t16:3_5: Yopi nānāāvāsesu ekeneva anupasampannena saddhiṁ tirattaṁ sahaseyyaṁ kappeti, tassapi.
tika-vin05t16:3_6: Yopi nānāāvāsesu nānāanupasampannehi saddhiṁ yojanasatampi gantvā sahaseyyaṁ kappeti,
tika-vin05t16:4_0: Ayañca sahaseyyāpatti nāma ‘‘bhikkhuṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso anupasampanno nāmā’’ti vacanato antamaso pārājikavatthubhūtena
tika-vin05t16:4_2: tasmā sacepi godhābiḷālamaṅgusādīsu koci pavisitvā bhikkhuno vasanasenāsane ekūpacāraṭṭhāne sayati,
tika-vin05t16:4_4: Yadi pana thambhānaṁ upari katapāsādassa uparimatalena saddhiṁ asambaddhabhittikassa bhittiyā upariṭhitasusiratulāsīsassa
tika-vin05t16:4_5: susirena pavisitvā tulāya abbhantare sayitvā teneva susirena nikkhamitvā gacchati,
tika-vin05t16:4_8: tena pavisitvā antochadane vasitvā teneva pakkamati,
tika-vin05t16:4_14: sabhāsaṅkhepena kate aḍḍhakuṭṭake senāsane sayitassa tulāvāḷasaghāṭādīsu kapotādayo sayanti,
tika-vin05t16:4_17: Parimaṇḍalaṁ vā caturassaṁ vā ekacchadanāya gabbhamālāya satagabbhaṁ cepi senāsanaṁ hoti,
tika-vin05t16:4_18: tatra ce ekena sādhāraṇadvārena pavisitvā visuṁ pākārena aparicchinnagabbhūpacāre sabbagabbhepi pavisanti,
tika-vin05t16:4_19: ekagabbhepi anupasampanne nipanne sabbagabbhesu nipannānaṁ āpatti.
tika-vin05t16:4_22: pamukhe sayito gabbhe sayitānaṁ āpattiṁ na karoti.
tika-vin05t16:4_24: tatra sayito sabbesaṁ āpattiṁ karoti. Kasmā?
tika-vin05t16:5_1: Yepi ekasāladvisālatisālacatusālasannivesā mahāpāsādā ekasmiṁ okāse pāde dhovitvā paviṭṭhena sakkā honti sabbattha anuparigantuṁ,
tika-vin05t16:5_3: Sace tasmiṁ tasmiṁ ṭhāne upacāraṁ paricchinditvā katā honti,
tika-vin05t16:5_5: Dvīhi dvārehi yuttassa sudhāchadanamaṇḍapassa majjhe pākāraṁ karonti,
tika-vin05t16:5_6: ekena dvārena pavisitvā ekasmiṁ paricchede anupasampanno sayati,
tika-vin05t16:5_11: Na hi chiddena gehaṁ ekūpacāraṁ nāma hoti.
tika-vin05t16:5_16: Na hi dvārapidahanena gehaṁ nānūpacāraṁ nāma hoti,
tika-vin05t16:5_20: Sace taṁ dvāraṁ puna iṭṭhakāhi pidahanti,
tika-vin05t16:5_26: dvinnaṁ kavāṭānaṁ antare anupasampanno antocetiyaghare sayantassa āpattiṁ karoti ekūpacārattā.
tika-vin05t16:6_1: senāsanaṁ khuddakaṁ vā hotu mahantaṁ vā,
tika-vin05t16:6_2: aññena saddhiṁ sambandhaṁ vā asambandhaṁ vā,
tika-vin05t16:6_3: dīghaṁ vā vaṭṭaṁ vā caturassaṁ vā,
tika-vin05t16:6_7: Ettha ca yena kenaci paṭicchadanena sabbacchanne sabbaparicchanne pācittiyaṁ,
tika-vin05t16:6_19: yebhuyyenaparicchanne cūḷakacchanne dukkaṭanti pañca dukkaṭāni veditabbāni.
tika-vin05t16:6_29: Yakkhipetīhi pana dissamānakarūpāhi tiracchānagatitthiyā ca methunadhammavatthubhūtāya eva dukkaṭaṁ,
